Package com.radirius.mercury.utilities

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Wipeable
    An abstraction for objects that can 'wipe' themselves, or self destruct.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Clipboard
    A utility to fetch clipboard data.
    DopplerReader
    A utility class for reading tile maps from Doppler Indie Games.
    GraphicsUtils
    A simple Utility class for the Graphics engine which contains some utility OpenGL rendering functions which are required by the classes in this graphics package.
    ImageUtil
    A utility for modifying BufferedImages.
    TaskTiming
    An easy to use utility for one-shot, and recurring timer-tasks.
    TaskTiming.Task  
    WipingArrayList<T extends Wipeable>
    An arraylist that you can wipe Wipeables with.
